function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to contain new strains of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Large outbreaks and difficulties in suppression","Mitigation":"Implement stricter quarantine measures and regular testing","Technologies":"Advanced testing and monitoring systems","People":"Public and travelers","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Infection spread within quarantine facilities","Impact":"Risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Enhance ventilation systems and implement strict infection control measures","Technologies":"Air filtration systems and contact tracing technology","People":"Quarantined individuals and hotel staff","Owner":"Hotel management and public health authorities"}]}
